      • getFillColor

        @Deprecated
public int getFillColor()
        Deprecated. Fill color support is going to be removed in the future
        Return the color drawn behind the circle-shaped drawable.
        Returns:
        The color drawn behind the drawable

      • setFillColor

        @Deprecated
public void setFillColor(int fillColor)
        Deprecated. Fill color support is going to be removed in the future
        Set a color to be drawn behind the circle-shaped drawable. Note that this has no effect if the drawable is opaque or no drawable is set.
        Parameters:
        fillColor - The color to be drawn behind the drawable

      • setFillColorResource

        @Deprecated
public void setFillColorResource(@ColorRes
                                              int fillColorRes)
        Deprecated. Fill color support is going to be removed in the future
        Set a color to be drawn behind the circle-shaped drawable. Note that this has no effect if the drawable is opaque or no drawable is set.
        Parameters:
        fillColorRes - The color resource to be resolved to a color and drawn behind the drawable
